citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:17 pm on
09/16/2015. The gate leading to the house was closed with a chain. Honked the vehicle horn multiple times and
called out to the licensee. Due to having no cell phone service in the area left the facility to make a call to the
licensee. Message left on the number provided and business card left on the gate. Departed the area at 6;00 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:17 pm on
09/16/2015.  The gate leading to the house was closed with a chain.  Honked the vehicle horn multiple times and
called out to the licensee.  Due to having no cell phone service in the area left the facility to make a call to the
licensee.  Message left on the number provided and business card left on the gate.  Departed the area at 6;00 pm.
